markdownRemark.excerpt: The OSDV’s, flagship project - TrustTheVote has been released to the common public amongst much fanfare - Hollywood and all participating. The goals of the…
markdownRemark.html:
The OSDV’s, flagship project - TrustTheVote has been released to the common public amongst much fanfare - Hollywood and all participating. The goals of the project are very simple - trusted, auditable, secure voting systems.

the project plans, software downloads and hardware specs can be found here. The source code version tracker is here.

Given our status as the world’s largest democracy, I’m really surprised we are’nt actively contributing to such projects.

Then again, I’m not surprised.

frontmatter.title: Open Source Digital Voting's TrustTheVote project
Local deb install for non-root users
